title: S4 Ep23: Turning competition research into competition policy
itunes:title: Turning competition research into competition policy
description:
The CEPR's Research Policy Network on competition policy (cepr.online/competition) launches this week. In the first of two special podcasts on the topic, Greg Crawford and Cristina Caffarra tell Tim Phillips why it is so important to have this debate now, and how academics can use the RPN to connect their research to real-world policy.

You can find out more about and register for the event on June 17th 2021 here: Privacy & Antitrust: "Integration", not just "Intersection"
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
